# Ignore unnecessary Unity files
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
UserSettings/

# Ignore .meta files and local settings
*.meta
*.sln
*.csproj
*.userprefs

# Ignore Unity's auto-generated VS Code settings
.vscode/

# Ignore crash reports and other logs
*.pidb
*.suo
*.user
*.waf
*.dll
